warrior.title: Warrior - The Frontline Soldier
warrior.description:
Primary Weapons: Swords, Axes, Spears

Warriors strive for excellence in armed combat, and fighting on the frontlines for their allies. Their natural resilience allows them to stand headfirst against their enemies, and their strength enables them to use the heaviest equipment available to them.

Specializations

SpecializationWeaponRole(s)
SlayerSwordsDPS, Tank
BerserkerAxeDPS, Tank
LancerSpearsDPS, Tank

Specialization Details

Slayer

Slayers use their great strength to unleash powerful, blazing attacks, wiping out their enemies with a destructive force.

Key Abilities:
  • Blazing Strike
  • Destructive Force
  • Power Surge
Stats Focus:
  • Strength
  • Critical Rate
  • Health
Berserker

Berserkers are ferocious fighters, utilizing their rage to cleave down their opponents and weaken their attacks.

Key Abilities:
  • Rage Mode
  • Crushing Blow
  • Battle Fury
Stats Focus:
  • Attack Power
  • Rage Generation
  • Defense
Lancer

Lancers slash and thrust at their opponents to inflict fatal wounds with a devastating, frigid power.

Key Abilities:
  • Piercing Thrust
  • Frost Lance
  • Shield Wall
Stats Focus:
  • Pierce Power
  • Ice Damage
  • Block Rate

mage.title: Mage - The Spellfighter
mage.description:
Primary Weapons: Catalysts, Scythes, Spears

Casters are naturally talents in magicks, using their abilities to weaken their enemies or empower their allies. Their powers allow them great control over the battlefield to change the course of it to their vision.

Specializations

SpecializationWeaponRole(s)
???CatalystsDPS
WarlockScythesDPS
BattlemageSpearsDPS

Specialization Details

??? (To be revealed)

This specialization is yet to be revealed.

Key Abilities:
  • ???
Stats Focus:
  • ???
Warlock

Warlocks dabble in the dark arts, afflicting their enemies with curses and weaknesses to make their souls an easy target.

Key Abilities:
  • Soul Drain
  • Curse of Weakness
  • Dark Empowerment
Stats Focus:
  • Dark Magic
  • Curse Power
  • Soul Harvest
Battlemage

Battlemages combine the art of melee and magic: Infusing their attacks with aquatic might, conjuring liquid weapons to rain down on their opponents.

Key Abilities:
  • Aqua Thrust
  • Electric Storm
  • Water Blade
Stats Focus:
  • Spell Power
  • Melee Damage
  • Elemental Control

ranger.title: Ranger - The Ranged Scout
ranger.description:
Primary Weapons: Bows, Daggers, Axes

Rangers are the recons of the group, able to move swiftly through terrain. In combat, they deliver ranged fire from the backline of their team, but if required can equip Melee weapons to perform swift attacks up close.

Specializations

SpecializationWeaponRole(s)
MarksmanBowsDPS
TempestDaggersDPS
???Axes???

Specialization Details

Marksman

Marksmen use the wind to guide their movements and their arrows, enabling them to hit their mark with deadly accuracy.

Key Abilities:
  • Wind Arrow
  • Precise Shot
  • Arrow Rain
Stats Focus:
  • Accuracy
  • Wind Control
  • Range
Tempest

Tempests move like lightning, utilizing throwing daggers to deliver a barrage of sharp attacks from a distance.

Key Abilities:
  • Storm of Blades
  • Swift Strike
  • Lightning Dash
Stats Focus:
  • Speed
  • Throwing Power
  • Agility
